review: My only gripe is the level in which the "Prime" available movies and the available to "buy" movies are in the same line up... making it all too easy to accidentally purchase unintentionally.  Also, why is there a "rent now" on a movie/show that is also a "watch now" in Prime... makes zero sense.  The UX of navigation of what is prime and what is to buy/rent needs to be within it's own categories of search... that would gain a 5th star from me.
